tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE signature_characteristics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  signature_id INT,
  speed_metric_id INT,
  pressure_metric_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (signature_id) REFERENCES signature_speed_metrics(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (speed_metric_id) REFERENCES signature_speed_metrics(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pressure_metric_id) REFERENCES signature_pressure_metrics(id)
);
